name: user-card.toml

component.name: User Card
component.description: Reusable card component that displays user information with avatar, name, email, role badge and actions

props.user: { id: string, name: string, email: string, role: string, avatar: string, createdAt?: string }

rawContent:
[component]
id = "user-card"
name = "User Card"
description = "Reusable card component that displays user information with avatar, name, email, role badge and actions"

[component.props]
user = "{ id: string, name: string, email: string, role: string, avatar: string, createdAt?: string }"
onDelete = "(id: string) => void"
showDelete = "boolean (default: true)"

[component.features]
list = [
  "User avatar with fallback initials",
  "Name and email display",
  "Role badge (admin/user/moderator)",
  "Join date formatting",
  "Delete action on hover (optional)"
]

[component.styling]
hover = "shadow-lg transition"
responsive = true

[component.usage]
code = """
import { UserCard } from '@/prototype/components/UserCard'

<UserCard
  user={{ id: '1', name: 'John', email: 'john@example.com', role: 'admin', avatar: '...' }}
  onDelete={(id) => console.log('Delete', id)}
  showDelete={true}
/>
"""

[relations]
entities = ["user"]
pages = ["users"]

[implementation]
component = "UserCard"
file = "src/prototype/components/UserCard.tsx"
preview = "/prototype/users"
status = "implemented"
